title: GT4 CAS Release Notes

section.title: Transport security is used by default
section.para: The transport security (HTTPS) mechanism is now assumed as the default security mechanism. CAS service clients will now automatically use this mechanism and will fall back to GSI Secure Message if pointed at an HTTP endpoint.

section.title: Internationalization
section.para: The CAS service code has been internationalized.

listitem.simpara: CAS does not work with MySQL.
